title: Bacon and Lentil Soup
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil', '5 rashers streaky bacon, cut into small pieces', '125g chopped carrots', '160g chopped onions', '125g chopped celery', '100g plain flour', '3.5 litres water', '2 bay leaves', '2 teaspoons salt', '190g dry lentils', '2 cubes beef stock', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 pinch ground white pepper', '150g potatoes, diced']
